text: Lols yes that makes sense. Sorry about the late responses lately things are not going so well in general where I’m working at so it’s been stressful putting stuff together for new work. Right now there’s a window open this month at a game studio my friend works at and she tells me they’re looking for vfx work so I’m quickly making some work to show by the end of the month. Once that goes throu then it’s polishing/ making more environment art lols.
